member.summary: Проверяет объект на null.
member.param: Сообщение об ошибке, если объект равен .

member.name: T:CG4.Extensions.DocumentationExtensions
member.summary: Utility class to provide documentation for various types where available with the assembly

member.name: F:CG4.Extensions.DocumentationExtensions.Cache
member.summary: A cache used to remember Xml documentation for assemblies

member.name: F:CG4.Extensions.DocumentationExtensions.FailCache
member.summary: A cache used to store failure exceptions for assembly lookups

member.name: M:CG4.Extensions.DocumentationExtensions.GetSummary(System.Type)
member.summary: Gets the summary portion of a type's documenation or returns an empty string if not available

member.name: M:CG4.Extensions.DocumentationExtensions.GetSummary(System.Reflection.MethodInfo)
member.summary: Returns the Xml documentation summary comment for this method

member.name: M:CG4.Extensions.DocumentationExtensions.GetSummary(System.Reflection.MemberInfo)
member.summary: Returns the Xml documenation summary comment for this member

member.name: M:CG4.Extensions.DocumentationExtensions.GetSummary(System.Xml.XmlElement)
member.summary: Find summary node and return inner text from this XmlElement

member.name: M:CG4.Extensions.DocumentationExtensions.GetDocumentation(System.Reflection.MethodInfo)
member.summary: Provides the documentation comments for a specific method
member.param: The MethodInfo (reflection data ) of the member to find documentation for
member.returns: The XML fragment describing the method

member.name: M:CG4.Extensions.DocumentationExtensions.GetDocumentation(System.Reflection.MemberInfo)
member.summary: Provides the documentation comments for a specific member
member.param: The MemberInfo (reflection data) or the member to find documentation for
member.returns: The XML fragment describing the member

member.name: M:CG4.Extensions.DocumentationExtensions.GetDocumentation(System.Type)
member.summary: Provides the documentation comments for a specific type
member.param: Type to find the documentation for
member.returns: The XML fragment that describes the type

member.name: M:CG4.Extensions.DocumentationExtensions.XmlFromAssembly(System.Reflection.Assembly)
member.summary: Obtains the documentation file for the specified assembly
member.param: The assembly to find the XML document for
member.remarks: This version uses a cache to preserve the assemblies, so that the XML file is not loaded and parsed on every single lookup

member.name: M:CG4.Extensions.DocumentationExtensions.XmlFromName(System.Type,System.Char,System.String)
member.summary: Obtains the XML Element that describes a reflection element by searching the members for a member that has a name that describes the element.
member.param: The type or parent type, used to fetch the assembly
The prefix as seen in the name attribute in the documentation XML
Where relevant, the full name qualifier for the element
member.returns: The member that has a name that describes the specified reflection element

member.name: M:CG4.Extensions.DocumentationExtensions.XmlFromAssemblyNonCached(System.Reflection.Assembly)
member.summary: Loads and parses the documentation file for the specified assembly
member.param: The assembly to find the XML document for

member.name: M:CG4.Extensions.LinqExtension.NullOrEmpty``1(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{``0})
member.summary: Проверяет, что коллекция равна или пуста.

member.name: T:CG4.Extensions.StringExtension
member.summary: Расширения для манипуляции строками.

member.name: M:CG4.Extensions.StringExtension.ToStr(System.String)
member.summary: Возвращает входную строку, если она не пустая, иначе .
member.returns: Строка, если не пустая или , иначе .

member.name: M:CG4.Extensions.StringExtension.ToInt(System.String,System.Nullable{System.Int32})
member.summary: Если передана не пустая строка, то парсит строку в целое число, иначе возвращает число по умолчанию.

member.name: M:CG4.Extensions.StringExtension.ToShort(System.String,System.Nullable{System.UInt16})
member.summary: Если передана не пустая строка, то парсит строку в целое число типа , иначе возвращает число по умолчанию.

member.name: M:CG4.Extensions.StringExtension.ToFloat(System.String,System.Nullable{System.Single})
member.summary: Если передана не пустая строка, то парсит строку в число с плавающей точкой, иначе возвращает число по умолчанию.

member.name: M:CG4.Extensions.StringExtension.ToDateTime(System.String)
member.summary: Если передана не пустая строка, то парсит строку в дату и время.

member.name: M:CG4.Extensions.StringExtension.ToExactDateTime(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Если передана не пустая строка, то парсит строку в дату и время по шаблону.

member.name: M:CG4.Extensions.StringExtension.FirstLetterToUpper(System.String)
member.summary: Делает первую букву переданной строки заглавной.
